solution_line_template: Cynthia was left with {total_potatoes} -{potatoes_for_wedges} = <<{total_potatoes}-{potatoes_for_wedges}={remaining_potatoes}>>{remaining_potatoes} potatoes after making wedges.
She used {remaining_potatoes}/{halved_divisor} = <<{remaining_potatoes}/{halved_divisor}={potatoes_for_chips}>>{potatoes_for_chips} potatoes to make potato chips.
Cynthia made {total_chips} - {total_wedges} = <<{total_chips}-{total_wedges}={difference_chips_wedges}>>{difference_chips_wedges} more potato chips than wedges.
